herself.translation[0].definitions[0].de: used to show that the woman or girl who does something is affected by her own action
herself.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She cut herself on some broken glass.
She made herself a cup of coffee.
herself.translation[0].definitions[1].de: used to emphasize that you are talking about one particular woman or girl
herself.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: It must be true that she’s leaving because she told me so herself.
The ornate Town Hall was opened by Queen Victoria herself.
herself.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: She met other mothers in the same situation as herself.
